section.name: Torque's generation tasks
section.p: Torque uses a single XML database schema to generate the SQL for your target database and Torque's Peer-based object relation model representing your XML database schema. Additionally, an HTML document describing the database can be generated if you wish to make a browseable version of the database schema.
Torque offers an Ant build file (build-torque.xml) which could be added to your project. It defines the following targets:

ul.li:
sql
generates SQL source from an XML schema describing a database structure

create-db
generates simple scripts for creating databases on various platforms.

datadtd
generates data DTD from an XML schema describing a database structure

datadump
dumping data from db into XML

datasql
generates SQL source from an XML data file

jdbc
generates an XML schema of an existing database from JDBC metadata

insert-sql
inserts a SQL file into its designated database

sql2xml
generates an xml schema from an sql schema

om
generates the Object/Peer/Manager modell for Torque.

id-table-init-sql
generates the initialization sql for the id table

subsection.name: OJB tasks
subsection.p: The OJB support is new and will be enhanced in future versions.

ul.li:
ojb-model
generates a simple object model for ojb

ojb-repository
generates the repository for ojb

doc
generates html or xml documentation for xml schemas

section.p: Maven offers a plugin for Torque.
